features: [MFi Certified]: Certified iPhone lightning cable for your lightning devices. Lightning Charger Cable use original authorization chip to ensure 100% compatibility with newest iOS system and promise no warning message pops up.. Brings you new experience-fast charging 2.4 A and stable data transfer up to 480 mb/s.

[Durable And Soft]：This iPhone cable has made by TPE material, It's skin-friendly, soft, and durable, it has been tested to withstand at least 30000 cycles of 95 degree bend which is 20 times stronger than original device cables. Flexible and tangle-free, meet all kinds of daily connection needs and long-term use.
[Charging&Data Sync]: Highly pure and four-core thicker copper wires ensure faster and more stable charging (supports up to 2.4 amps charging current and high-speed data transferring 480Mbps ).

[Universal Compatibility]: Compact lightning connector head design ensure that the iPhone charger cable fit most phone cases and accessories. Compatible with iPhone 14/13/ 12/ 11, 14/13/12/11 Pro, 14/13/12/11 Pro Max, 14/13/12 Mini, XS Max, XS, XR, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, 6S Plus, 6S, 6 Plus, 6, 5S, 5C, 5, iPad Pro, iPad Air, Air 2, iPad mini, mini 2, mini 4, iPad 4th gen ,iPod Touch 5th gen, iPod nano 7th gen and Beats Pill+.

[What You Get]: 3 pack colorful 3FT Mfi Certified USB-A To Lightning cable and dedicated Amazon customer service. Our items offer 1 year warranty and 30 days refund in case of natural damage. Any problems please feel free to contact us, we will reply you in 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MFi Certified iPhone Charger Cable The Apple MFI Certified USB-A to Lightning Charging Cable provides both charging and data transfer functionalities. It can be used to charge your iPhone, iPad, or iPod, as well as transfer data between your device and your computer. You can enjoy fast charging [5V/2.4A] and high-speed data transferring [480Mbps].

Flexible & Durable The USB A to iPhone charging cable is designed with an ultra-durable High quality spring and seamlessly molded joints for superior resistance to breakage. With 30000+ bend lifespan, the durable, tangle-free charger cables withstand a variety of everyday connection needs and long-term use. Soft & Smooth The lightning cable is made of soft and smooth TPE colorful material, which is not only more durable and wear-resistant, but also brings you a wonderful visual experience and adds color to your life. Fast Charge & High Speed Data Sync We selected MFI Certified chips and four-core higher quality copper wires to make, which makes charging faster and more stable. You can enjoy fast charging [2.4A] and high-speed data transferring [480Mbps].

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS: Q: Does it charge fast ? A: Yes, it charges quickly with the 2.4A (max) current. Q. Does it support data transfer? A: Sure, it supports smoothly transfer data at a speed of 480Mbps. Q: Will it work with phone with cases ? A: Yes, this cable is slim enough to perfectly fit for most of cases. Q: Is this cable MFi Certified ? A: The iPhone charger cable we sell is a true MFi-certified Lightning cable.

Compatibility Compatible with: iPhone 14/13/12/11/ Pro/Max/X/XS/XR/XS Max,iPhone 8,iPhone 8 Plus,iPhone 7 Plus,iPhone 7,iPhone SE, iPhone 6s Plus,iPhone 6s,iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6,iPhone 5s,iPhone 5c,iPhone 5, iPad Pro(9.7-inch), iPad Pro(12.9-inch),iPad Air 2, iPad Air, iPad(5th generation)，iPad(4th generation)，iPad mini 4, iPad mini 3，iPad mini 2, iPad mini,iPod touch (6th generation) and iPod touch(5th generation). NOTE: this cable won't fit for the following devices. Not compatible with iPad Pro 11 inch (2018), iPad Pro 11 inch (2020), iPad Pro 12.9 inch (2018), iPad Pro 12.9 inch (2020) ,iPad 10.2 (2020,8th generation) ,iPad Air (2020, 4th generation)

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to use for my job. They are perfect for what I need them for. Plus I have a few extra for at home and in my work bag. They seem to be durable and work without any trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work great! I like the colors and the durable ends. They help us differentiate between our older lightning connector iPhones and the newer USBC iPhone connectors when going to our charging station. I would recommend these and purchase again.
